section.name: Team
section.para: The work for the project was broken down into the following parts: Research, developing an approach, coding the algorithms, testing and debugging the code, making the poster and writing the connexions report. The work for the project was evenly distributed between the four members of the team. Each member of the team worked on all parts of the project to some degree. We each feel that every member of the group did their fair share of the project.
